summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.7 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (down 0.6 mm), cloud levels (up 1630 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and little or no wind. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
